item.title: New Servers New Cluster
item.description: Work is getting rid of a bunch of servers. They had a 1 server per person order. I picked up a Dell R730xd for storage. If they do not sell out I should be able to pick up more. I am hoping to replace all the R410s with R420s and get 3 R630s for a proper proxmox cluster.
